name: The one who pulls out the sword will be crowned king (Majorariatto)
name_original: The one who pulls out the sword will be crowned king (Majorariatto)
description:
The one who pulls out the sword will be crowned king is a short experimental game.

Grab the sword with your mouse and pull it out from the stone. If you are able to get it all the way out, you will prove that you are the rightful king and as such you will be crowned.

Pull it out now and become a king or surrender and keep living like a peasant.
